title: Anyone else banned for botting, but havent been botting?
body:
Hey guys, 

Just wanted to see if anyone else has been hit with this bs, I've never botted in my life, nor have i had any third party software or anything of that nature.

However I woke to find a very disturbing message on my screen this morning as i tried to log in.

"Your account has been permanently suspended, due to suspicious activity surrounding blahblah botting ect."

So i contact riot games, you know, hey guys I've been banned and all that, I'm innocent, and I'd like my account back.

Nah man accused is all we need, fuck your account.

....

This isn't OK

For the record again 100% innocent (mildly toxic...just a lil, but I've never botted or any thing like that)

Riot Games, this is not only unfair, and unjustified, it goes against everything i stand for as a human being. which is to say "No we don't need any evidence, nor do we need to show you our lack of evidence, nor do we even fucking care."

Well Riot, I'll call you out on your bullshit

I didn't fucking bot, do i deserve to be banned?

Ps. Sorry for the toxicity lads (and ladies), it's still fresh and oooo does it cut.

replies.body:
Hey Zatyr,

It seems that your account was banned by mistake due to association with other accounts flagged for botting.

Usually submitting a ticket will get your account unbanned if we confirm it was a mistake, but in your case it wasn't easy for the person handling the ticket to tell given the direct association with some other proven bots.

Not to worry, I've cleared things up and they'll be getting back to you soon.
